title: Uncut
description: He was a former Marine.He used to be an enforcer for the Unacceptables MC.Ryan Axston gave up everything for love - for me. His patch, his gun, everything he thought he wanted in life. He claims that nothing compares to our perfect new life.But is everything too perfect?â€‹Could an outlaw really walk away completely?Uncut is a followup to Undeniable, but can be read as a standalone. Find Undeniable here: http://amzn.to/2zo7xSLUndeniable and Uncut are crossovers between Author Susan Stoker's Delta Force Heroes Series (http://amzn.to/2vB73Vj) and Kristen Hope Mazzola's Unacceptables MC Series (http://amzn.to/2vBzOkz).
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
